generated_body: If you click on the article titled "85 Thanksgiving Recipes You Can Make Ahead," you can expect a comprehensive collection of recipes designed to simplify your holiday meal preparation. The article is likely to highlight a variety of dishes, including appetizers, main courses, and desserts that can be prepared in advance, allowing for a more relaxed Thanksgiving experience. Additionally, it may provide tips on storage and reheating methods to ensure that the dishes maintain their flavor and quality.
